body: Taskcluster build failure is related. I've copied svg files from m-c, and the dupe checker found the files in both places. I'm not sure what to do about this. @gijsk any ideas? We'll be removing the originals with [bug 1366005](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1366005). Maybe we just need to do these two things atomically together?
